trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Reno
There were no other sightings in Reno on or around October 22nd 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsHere I go again...this is the third time in 4 months I've seen this type of thing here. Just looked up into the night sky as I walked out of my apartment and noticed a very bright sphere going from the northwest to the southeast. At first I thought that it was zig zagging slightly but I could have been mistaken because of the disorientation I usually feel when I see these things. It stood out because the glow seemed to be brighter than the moon that was right beside it. I checked for blinking lights in case it may have been a plane but there were none, just a steady bright glow, and it flew a straight line until it started to disintegrate. It slowly started to dissolve..sort of reappeared then completely dissolved. There were no clouds for it to go behind.
